description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
  • Slightly increases Bear Trap setting speed.
name: Trapper Gloves

description:
A large and heavy Coil spring which add a good amount of strength to the Bear Trap hold.
  • Slightly increases Bear Trap disarm time.
name: Strong Coil Spring

description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system with 4 coil springs adding a great amount of strength to the traps' hold.
  • Moderately increases the Bear Trap disarm time.
name: 4-Coil Spring Kit

description:
Wood Ashes. When boiled, can be used to dye Bear Traps and make them less noticeable.
  • Moderately darkens all Bear Traps.
name: Logwood Dye

description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw like blades which cause awful open wounds when they snap.
  • survivors caught in a Bear Trap suffer from the Hemorrhage status effect until healed.
name: Serrated Jaws
flavor: "Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

description:
Simple tools designed to quickly and safely set Bear Traps.
  • Moderately increases Bear Trap setting speed.
name: Trap Setters

description:
A cured leather waist bag. Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
  • Start with 1 extra Bear Trap
  • Allows the transportation of 2 extra Bear Traps.
name: Trapper Bag

description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • survivors caught in a Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled status effect.
name: Rusted Jaws

description:
A secondary coil which keeps a Bear Trap effective in times when the primary coils becomes unusable.
  • Considerably increases the Bear Trap disarm time.
name: Secondary Coil

description:
A black, matte and sticky substance similar to tar. When applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
  • Considerably darkens all Bear Traps.
name: Tar Bottle

description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
  • Moderately reduces the chance of escaping a Bear Trap.
name: Wax Brick

description:
A clear oil that makes handling the traps' springs more hazardous.
  • Tremendously increases the Bear Traps disarm time.
name: Oily Coil

description:
A specialized set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
  • Tremendously increases Bear Trap setting speed.
  • Considerably increases the rescue and escape time from Bear Traps.
  • Moderately reduces the chances of escaping a Bear Trap.
name: Fastening Tools

description:
Skin pieces of all sorts crudely stitched together making for a very large bag.
  • Start with 2 extra Bear Traps.
  • Allows the transportation of 2 extra Bear Traps.
name: Stitched Bag

description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the traps' springs more dangerous.
  • When a trap is disarmed by a healthy Survivor, the bloody coils exact their price and that Survivor becomes injured.
  • Slightly increases Bear Trap disarm time.
name: Bloody Coil

description:
Traps sharpened with this sickly gleaming stone seem to gain a life of their own.
  • Every 30 seconds, one closed Bear Trap chosen at random becomes set.
name: Iridescent Stone

description:
The Laokeye symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • The Wraith will Uncloak completely when breaking pallets or damaging generators while Cloaked.
name: "The Serpent" - Soot

description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • While Cloaked, fresh blood marks are considerably more discernible than normal.
name: "The Hound" - Soot

description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the spirit world, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • After Uncloaking, the Wraith's Terror Radius and Red Stain will remain suppressed for 6 seconds.
name: "The Ghost" - Soot

description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the realm of fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.
  • The Wraith's Terror Radius is no longer suppressed while Cloaked.
  • Bloodpoints granted for Stalking and surprise attacks are increased by 100%.
name: "The Beast" - Soot

description:
A bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone. Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
  • survivors can no longer discern the Wailing Bell's distance or direction.
name: Bone Clapper

description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Considerably reduces The Wraith's disappearance time.
name: "Blink" - Mud

description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Moderately increases The Wraith's movement speed while Cloaked.
name: "Windstorm"- Mud

description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Slightly reduces The Wraith's reappearance time.
name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud

description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Surprise attacks inflict survivors with aura blindness for 60 seconds.
name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud

description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Considerably increases The Wraith's movement speed while Cloaked.
name: "Windstorm" - White

description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Moderately reduces The Wraith's reappearance time.
name: "Swift Hunt" - White

description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Considerably reduces the time required to vault windows, open lockers, break pallets and breakables, or damage generators while Cloaked.
name: "Shadow Dance" - White

description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Tremendously reduces The Wraith's disappearance time.
name: "Blink" - White

description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Surprise attacks inflict survivors with the Mangled and Hemorrhage status effects until fully healed.
name: "Blind Warrior" - White

description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the bell.
  • Tremendously increases The Wraith's movement speed while Cloaked.
name: "Windstorm" - Blood

description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
  • Considerably reduces The Wraith's reappearance time.
name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood

description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Tremendously reduces the time required to vault windows, open lockers, break pallets and breakables, or damage generators while Cloaked.
name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood

description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
  • Unlocks hidden potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the auras of survivors within 12 meters are revealed to you.
name: "All Seeing" - Blood

description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound. A malevolent aura emanates from it.
  • Renders the Wailing Bell completely silent.
name: Coxcombed Clapper

description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, glows ominously on the head of the bell.
  • Unlocks awesome potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.
name: "All Seeing" - Spirit

description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.

  • Decreases the collision zone during a Chainsaw Sprint.
name: Heavy Clutch

description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.

  • survivors hit with the Chainsaw are damaged for a single health state.
  • Get 100% more Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit score events.
name: Speed Limiter

description:
A cracked and dusty filter, it still manages to work better than the stock model.

  • Slightly increases the Chainsaw’s overheat limit.
name: Junkyard Air Filter

description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.

  • Slightly decreases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw.
name: Steel Toe Boots

description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.

  • Slightly increases the Chainsaw’s rate of cooling.
name: Punctured Muffler

description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol’ country boys.

  • Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters when the Chainsaw is overheating.
name: Big Buckle

description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.

  • Slightly reduces the noise made by the Chainsaw.
name: Off-Brand Motor Oil

description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Sr.

  • Moderately increases Chainsaw Sprint steering.
name: Dad's Boots

description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took. Fills the user with determination.
  • Slightly increases the Chainsaw's movement speed.
  • Slightly increases Chainsaw charge time.
name: Death Engravings

description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson’s purse. Side effects include nervousness and irritability.

  • Slightly decreases Chainsaw charge time for 30 seconds after being stunned by a pallet.
name: Mother's Helpers
flavor: "Doctor, please, more of these." —Evelyn Thompson

description:
A specialized chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.

  • Considerably reduces the time penalty when bumping into obstacles during a Chainsaw Sprint.
name: Low Kickback Chains

description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter’s scent when stalking prey.

  • Gain the Undetectable status effect for 15 seconds after landing a Chainsaw hit.
name: Leafy Mash

description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in The Fog. Fills the user with determination.
  • Moderately increases movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint.
  • Slightly increases Chainsaw charge time.
name: Doom Engravings

description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.

  • Moderately increases the Chainsaw's rate of cooling when a Flashlight is shining on you.
name: Black Grease

description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburetor has been well adjusted.

  • Moderately decreases Chainsaw charge time.
  • Reduce base movement speed to 4.4 m/s.
name: Tuned Carburetor

description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow in mud for more stability and control with each step.
  • Tremendously increases steering while using the Chainsaw.
  • Considerably increases the time penalty when bumping in objects.
name: Spiked Boots

description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances. Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.

  • Moderately decreases the heat gained when starting to rev the Chainsaw.
name: Pighouse Gloves
flavor: "Ain’t no mess can stain a hard-workin' man’s soul." — Max Thompson Sr.

description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater maneuverability.

  • Continue a Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a pallet or a wall.
  • survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a pallet or a wall are damaged for a single health state.
name: LoPro Chains

description:
Once representative of Max Jr’s confinement, this was the first brick to fall when his room’s barricade came crashing down.

  • After maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds, gain the Undetectable status effect until you stop sprinting.
name: Iridescent Brick
flavor: "What kinda ruckus you stirrin’, boy?" — Max Thompson Sr.

description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.

  • Chainsaw is silent for survivors outside the Terror Radius.
name: Apex Muffler

description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse. Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
  • Moderately decreases extra fatigue from missed Blink attacks.
name: Wooden Horse

description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic. Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
  • Moderately decreases the distance of Blink lunge attacks.
  • Increases bloodpoints for Blink attack score events by 100%.
name: White Nit Comb

description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon. Confiscated from room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
  • Hitting a Survivor with a successful Blink attack causes their sounds of pain to be Moderately louder for 60 seconds.
name: Metal Spoon

description:
A rotten molar extirpated from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a successful Blink attack causes their auras to be revealed when healing or being healed within a 28 meter range for 60 seconds.
name: Bad Man Keepsake

description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces. Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
  • Moderately increases the length of the Chain Blink window.
name: Pocket Watch

description:
A worthless piece of jewelry that might have had an important significance to someone. Taken from the anxious girl's body.
  • Moderately decreases maximum Blink distance.
  • Increases Bloodpoints for precise Blink score events by 100%
name: Dull Bracelet

description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning. Taken from Father Campbell's body.
  • Moderately increases Blink recharge speed.
name: Dark Cincture

description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement. Taken from the catatonic boy's body.
  • Considerably reduces extra fatigue from Chain Blinks.
name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure

description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man." Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a successful Blink attack disables The Nurse's ability to Blink and increases The Nurse's base movement speed to 4.6 m/s for 60 seconds.
name: Spasmodic Breath

description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from the fat orderly. Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
  • Considerably increases maximum Blink range.
  • Considerably increases maximum Blink charge time.
name: Heavy Panting

description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell. Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
  • Considerably increases Blink recharge speed.
name: Fragile Wheeze

description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the catatonic boy. Normally stable and calm, becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Moderately decreases Blink fatigue duration.
name: Ataxic Respiration

description:
The gasp of surprise collected from an anxious girl which The Nurse was fond of. Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
  • Blinking past a Survivor causes them to scream and awards 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.
name: Anxious Gasp

description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel. The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
  • Allows The Nurse to see Blink target locations.
name: Plaid Flannel

description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh. In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
  • Tremendously increases maximum Blink range.
  • Tremendously increases maximum Blink charge time.
name: Kavanagh's Last Breath

description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum patient Mary Jenner. In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
  • After Blinking, allows The Nurse to immediately Blink back to her original position by pressing the Active Ability button. Must be triggered before The Nurse succumbs to fatigue.
name: Jenner's Last Breath

description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum priest Father Campbell. In the hands of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
  • After reappearing from a fully charged Blink, The Nurse immediately Blinks at half charge in the direction she is currently facing.
name: Campbell's Last Breath

description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum patient "the Bad Man." In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a successful Blink attack grants The Nurse's the Undetectable status for 16  seconds.
  • This effect may be only triggered once every 60 seconds.
name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath

description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book. Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
  • Adds 1 Blink charge.
  • Blinks are restricted to locations in the Nurse's line of sight.
name: Torn Bookmark

description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons. Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
  • Removes 1 Blink charge.
  • Increases The Nurse's base movement speed to 4.2 m/s.
name: Matchbox

description:
A very cheap piece of jewelry made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
  • Slightly increases movement speed while Stalking.
name: Tacky Earrings

description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
  • Slightly increases the lunge of Evil Within I.
name: Boyfriend's Memo
flavor: "The note is signed: D."

description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
  • Slightly increases the duration of Evil Within III.
  • Slightly increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
name: Blond Hair

description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
  • Evil Within II reveals the aura of survivors who've been Stalked for at least 1 second.
  • Aura stays visible for a duration of 2 seconds.
name: Reflective Fragment

description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
  • Slightly increases the rate at which evil is gained when Stalking a Survivor.
name: Memorial Flower

description:
A large necklace made of beads and inexpensive metals. One of Judith's favorites.
  • Moderately increases movement speed while Stalking.
name: Jewelry

description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
  • Moderately increases the duration of Evil Within III.
  • Slightly increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
name: Hair Brush

description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object. It is impossible to determine its origin.
  • Evil Within I reveals the aura of survivors who've been Stalked for at least 1 second.
  • Aura stays visible for a duration of 3 seconds.
name: Glass Fragment

description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
  • Moderately reduces the Terror Radius of Evil Within II.
  • Moderately increases the Terror Radius of Evil Within III.
name: Dead Rabbit

description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
  • Evil Within II reveals the aura of survivors who've been Stalked for at least 1 second.
  • Aura stays visible for a duration of 5 seconds.
name: Mirror Shard

description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers. Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
  • You become obsessed with one Survivor.
  • Considerably increases the rate at which evil is gained when Stalking your Obsession.
  • Only one Obsession per match.
name: Judith's Journal

description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
  • Considerably increases movement speed while Stalking.
name: Jewelry Box

description:
A glossy page ripped from the '65 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
  • Moderately increases the rate at which evil is gained when Stalking a Survivor.
name: J.Myers Memorial

description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
  • Considerably increases the duration of Evil Within III.
  • Slightly increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
name: Hair Bow

description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
  • Evil Within II reveals survivors' auras when Stalking within a 16 meter range.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past TIER II.
  • Slightly reduces movement speed.
  • For each Hit score event, grant 100% Bloodpoints for the Hit score event in the Brutality category and an additional 150% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.
name: Vanity Mirror

description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
  • Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured survivors with Evil Within III.
  • Disables the ability to Stalk with Evil Within III.
  • Killing a Survivor considerably drains the power of Evil Within.
  • Considerably increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
name: Tombstone Piece

description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
  • Evil Within I reveals survivors' auras when Stalking within a 32 meter range.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past TIER I.
  • For each Hit score event, grant 100% Bloodpoints for the Hit score event in the Brutality category and an additional 200% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.
name: Scratched Mirror

description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
  • Tremendously increases the duration of Evil Within III.
  • Moderately increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
name: Lock of Hair

description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
  • Unlocks the ability to kill healthy, or injured survivors with Evil Within III.
  • Disables the ability to Stalk with Evil Within III.
  • Tremendously increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
  • Moderately decreases movement speed.
name: Judith's Tombstone
flavor: "Here lies our beloved daughter."

description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp. Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
  • Unlimited duration of Evil within III.
  • Tremendously increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair

description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
  • Slightly reduces the setting time of Phantasm Traps.
name: Rope Necklet

description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
  • Slightly increases the tripped Phantasm Trap duration time.
name: Powdered Eggshell

description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Slightly increases the distance from where The Hag can Teleport to her traps.
name: Dead Fly Mud

description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
  • Slightly increases the effective Phantasm Trap range.
name: Bog Water

description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
  • Reveals the Survivor’s aura for 3 seconds when they trip the Phantasm Trap.
name: Pussy Willow Catkins

description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
  • Moderately increases the tripped Phantasm Trap duration time.
name: Half Eggshell

description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Moderately increases the distance from where The Hag can Teleport to her traps.
name: Dragonfly Wings

description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
  • Moderately reduces the setting time of Phantasm Traps.
name: Cypress Necklet

description:
Tainted water contained in a folded waterlily leaf.
  • Moderately increases the effective Phantasm Trap range.
name: Bloodied Water

description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
  • Reveals the Survivor’s aura for 5 seconds when they trip the Phantasm Trap.
name: Willow Wreath

description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
  • Considerably reduces the setting time of Phantasm Traps.
name: Swamp Orchid Necklet

description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash. Crispy. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Considerably increases the distance from where The Hag can Teleport to her traps.
name: Dried Cicada

description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
  • Considerably increases the tripped Phantasm Trap duration time.
name: Cracked Turtle Egg

description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson. The bloody layers empower the mud.
  • Considerably increases the effective Phantasm Trap range.
name: Bloodied Mud

description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Mud Phantasms have collision.
  • Removes The Hag's ability to Teleport to traps.
  • Grants 300% Bloodpoints from Deviousness.
  • Trumps all other add-ons.
name: Scarred Hand
flavor: "…" -The Butcher

description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Tripped Phantasm Traps give no indication of being tripped to the Survivor.
  • Trap does not spawn a Hag Phantasm.
name: Rusty Shackles

description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Reduces The Hag's heartbeat range to 0 when a Survivor trips a Phantasm Trap.
  • Increases Mud Phantasm’s heartbeat radius by 16 meters.
name: Granma's Heart
flavor: "Bring me another slice of the girl." -Grandma

description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear. Deformed due to several hits to the head. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • survivors who trip a Phantasm Trap are deafened for 6 seconds.
name: Disfigured Ear

description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • survivors within a Phantasm Trap's trigger range will suffer from the Hindered status effect.
  • Increases the Hag's movement speed slightly.
  • Removes The Hag's ability to Teleport to traps.
name: Waterlogged Shoe

description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • The Hag can Teleport to any Phantasm Trap in the level.
  • Phantasm Trap Teleport has a cooldown of 15 seconds.
name: Mint Rag

description:
A moldy electrode which nevertheless conducts a weak electrical current.
  • Slightly increases range of Shock Therapy.
name: Moldy Electrode

description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple. This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.
  • Reveals the area of effect of your Shock Therapy special attack.
name: Maple Knight

description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute. Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.
  • Slightly Decreases the cooldown of Static Blast.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Order:
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.
  • A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.
name: "Order" - Class I

description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.
  • Slightly Increases your Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready.
  • Slightly Decreases your Terror Radius while Static Blast is on cooldown.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
  • Madness II: Intermittently causes survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Constantly causes survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
name: "Calm" - Class I

description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise. Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.

  • Shock Therapy special ability changes from a cone to a ring, appearing 8 meters in front of The Doctor, with an outer radius of 4.2 meters and an inner radius of 3 meters.
name: Scrapped Tape

description:
A like-new electrode, standard equipment to conduct electroconvulsive treatments.
  • Moderately increases range of Shock Therapy.
name: Polished Electrode

description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an un-edited interview of a victim. Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
  • Shock Therapy special ability changes from a cone to a beam with a 24 meter range and a 2 meter width.
name: Interview Tape

description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • Reveals survivors' auras for 1 second when their Madness level increases.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
  • Moderately Increases illusionary Doctor duration.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary Doctors.
name: "Restraint" - Class II

description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute. Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.
  • Moderately Decreases the cooldown of Static Blast.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Order:
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.
  • A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.
    • "Side effects are very rare." -Léry's Memorial Institute
name: "Order" - Class II

description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage. Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.
  • Slightly Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
  • Madness II: While in a chase, survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.
  • Madness III: illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.
  • The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.
    • "We re-educate our patients with the greatest care." -Léry's Memorial Institute
name: "Discipline" - Class II

description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.
  • Moderately Increases your Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready.
  • Moderately Decreases your Terror Radius while Static Blast is on cooldown.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
  • Madness II: Intermittently causes survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Constantly causes survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
    • "Electroconvulsive therapy is one of the safest medical procedures." -Léry's Memorial Institute
name: "Calm" - Class II

description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very-high charges for a longer period of time.
  • Considerably increases range of Shock Therapy.
name: High Stimulus Electrode

description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • Reveals survivors' auras for 2 seconds when their Madness level increases.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
  • Moderately Increases illusionary Doctor duration.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary Doctors.
name: "Restraint" - Class III

description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage. Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.
  • Moderately Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
  • Madness II: While in a chase, survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.
  • Madness III: illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.
  • The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.
    • "Respect of our patients is at the core of our principles." -Léry's Memorial Institute
name: "Discipline" - Class III

description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated. Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • Reveals survivors' auras for 3 seconds when their Madness level increases.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
  • Moderately Increases illusionary Doctor duration.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary Doctors.
    • "I CAN SEE THEIR DISGUSTING ILLNESSES." -Unsigned Notes
name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes

description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.
  • Considerably Decreases the cooldown of Static Blast.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Order:
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.
  • A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.
    • "The stimulus must be kept active at a convulsive level." -H. Carter
name: "Order" - Carter's Notes

description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in an severe state of paranoia.
  • Considerably Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
  • Madness II: While in a chase, survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.
  • Madness III: illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.
  • The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.
    • "To avoid relapse from our most tenacious subjects, use maximum levels when proceeding with disciplinary actions." -H. Carter
name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes

description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.
  • Considerably Increases your Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready.
  • Considerably Decreases your Terror Radius while Static Blast is on cooldown.

    • survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
  • Madness II: Intermittently causes survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Constantly causes survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
    • "Higher quality seizures trigger catatonia. At least it gives me peace for the time it lasts." -H. Carter
name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes

description:
A glass-like king chess piece molded from The Fog Itself. The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.

survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the following Afflictions: Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint.
  • Intermittently causes survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.
  • While in a chase, survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends in Madness II and is constantly active in Madness III.
  • Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached. A new illusionary pallets is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.
  • Moderately Increases illusionary Doctor duration.
  • The Doctor sees illusionary Red Stains as well as the auras of illusionary Doctors and illusionary pallets.
name: Iridescent King
flavor: "Gazing in the iridescent glass is plunging oneself into madness" -Unsigned Notes

description:
A glass-like queen chess piece molded from The Fog Itself. It can't be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.
  • All survivors struck by the Shock Therapy or Static Blast special abilities acquire a lingering Static Charge. The Static Charge remains with The Survivor(s) until discharged.
  • Multiple survivors struck by the same Shock Therapy or Static Blast special ability that are within 4 meters of each other do not acquire a Static Charge.
  • Any time a Survivor is within 4 meters of another Survivor carrying a Static Charge, The Survivor receives a shock with identical effects as the Shock Therapy special ability and the Static Charge is discharged immediately.
name: Iridescent Queen
flavor: "Once we have established an effective method of treatment, we can focus on its efficient means of delivery." -H. Carter

description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good. A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
  • The grunts of pain from hit targets are increased by 50% until they are fully healed.
name: Coarse Stone

description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
  • +10% Hatchet flight speed.
name: Yellowed Cloth

description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchets' haft.
  • Slightly decreases cooldown time between Hatchet Throws.
name: Bandaged Haft

description:
A toxin applied to the Hatchets' blade. The Amanita mushrooms' toxin numbs the mind.
  • Hit target suffers from the Blindness status effect for 60 seconds.
  • Does not stack.
name: Amanita Toxin

description:
An oddly weighted hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target. It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
  • Hit target suffers from the Incapacitated status effect for 10 seconds.
name: Weighted Head

description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen. Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
  • Slightly increases your movement speed while winding up your throw action.
  • Does not stack.
name: Shiny Pin

description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
  • Moderately decreases cooldown time between Hatchet Throws.
name: Oak Haft

description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Moderately decreases Hatchet wind up time.
name: Manna Grass Braid

description:
This leather strip tied into a loop can be attached to a belt to allow easy transportation of tools.
  • Start with 1 extra Hatchet.
  • Increases maximum carried Hatchet amount by 1.
name: Leather Loop

description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
  • +20% Hatchet flight speed.
name: Rose Root

description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
  • Moderately decreases Hatchets' reload time at a locker.
name: Deerskin Gloves

description:
A toxic concoction applied to the Hatchets' blade. The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus snake venom which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
  • Hit target suffers from the Exhausted status effect for 5 seconds.
name: Venomous Concoction

description:
These Hatchets' heads are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Hit target suffers from the Mangled status effect.
name: Rusty Head

description:
A clean and colorful kerchief adorned with a flower pattern. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Considerably decreases Hatchet wind up time.
name: Flower Babushka

description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier. Its multiple leather loops and holsters are useful to transport tools.
  • Start with 2 extra Hatchets.
  • Increases maximum carried Hatchet amount by 2.
name: Infantry Belt

description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
  • Hit victims' auras are shown to you for 5 seconds.
name: Glowing Concoction

description:
These Hatchets' heads are stained with a foul substance that afflict anyone it touches with debilities.
  • Hit target suffers from the Mangled and Hemorrhage status effects until fully healed.
  • Does not stack.
name: Begrimed Head

description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches. A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
  • Grants the Undetectable status effect for 15 seconds after reloading.
name: Wooden Fox

description:
A glass-like Hatchet head molded from The Fog Itself. The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
  • Successful Hatchet hits immediately put healthy survivors into the dying state.
  • Sets maximum number of carried Hatchets to 1.
name: Iridescent Head
flavor: "The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."

description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier, it provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
  • The Huntress moves 4.6 m/s when she has no Hatchets.
name: Soldier's Puttee

description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.

  • Slightly decreases the Chainsaw's cooldown when successfully hitting a Survivor.
name: Vegetable Oil

description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.

  • Slightly increases the rate at which charges replenish.
name: Spark Plug

description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.
  • Slightly reduces the Tantrum duration.
name: Chainsaw File

description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.

  • Chainsaw does not automatically trigger dying state.
  • Get 100% more Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit score events.
name: Speed Limiter

description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.

  • Moderately increases the rate at which charges replenish.
name: Primer Bulb

description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.

  • Slightly increases the amount of revving available before triggering a Tantrum.
name: Long Guide Bar

description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade. Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.

  • Slightly increases Chainsaw movement speed.
  • Slightly increases charge time.
name: Knife Scratches

description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.

  • Moderately reduces the Tantrum duration.
name: Homemade Muffler

description:
A big bowl of steaming chili to keep you fresh and strong.

  • Slightly increases dash duration when a token is consumed.
  • Slightly increases the additional Chainsaw Sweep window.
name: Chili
flavor: "I got some good barbecue here! " -Drayton Sawyer

description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers. Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.

  • Moderately increases the amount of revving available before triggering a Tantrum.
name: The Grease

description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog. Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.

  • Moderately increases Chainsaw movement speed.
  • Slightly increases charge time.
name: The Beast's Marks

description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.
  • survivors hit by the Chainsaw suffer from the Mangled status effect.
name: Grisly Chain

description:
An oil specifically formulated for chainsaws. A special additive prevents oil throw off.

  • Downing a Survivor with the Chainsaw while no other survivors are in your Terror Radius will hide the Survivor's aura for 20 seconds.
name: Shop Lubricant

description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.

  • Chainsaw hits cause survivors to drop their items.
name: Begrimed Chains

description:
Tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".
  • Increases the number of charges.
  • Slightly increases charge time.
  • Slightly decreases the Chainsaw Sweep's maximum speed.
name: Depth Gauge Rake

description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar. Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.

  • While revving, see the auras of survivors within 8 meters.
name: Light Chassis

description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.

  • survivors injured by the Chainsaw suffer from the Broken status effect for 90 seconds.
  • Does not stack.
name: Rusted Chain

description:
A big bowl of spicy chili made famous thanks to prime meat.

  • Moderately increases dash duration when a token is consumed.
  • Moderately increases the additional Chainsaw window.
name: Award-Winning Chili
flavor: "The secret's in the meat." -Drayton Sawyer

description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh. The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.

  • Hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw replenishes its charges.
  • Limits the maximum Tantrum duration to 8 seconds.
name: Iridescent Flesh
flavor: "There are moments when we cannot believe that what is happening is really true. Pinch yourself and you may find out that it is." — Pam Jones

description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburetor.
  • Automatically consume all charges when triggering a Chainsaw Sweep.
  • Slightly increases the Chainsaw Sweep's duration.
  • Slightly decreases the Chainsaw Sweep's maximum speed.
name: Carburetor Tuning Guide

description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
While survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Slightly increases healing and repair regression penalties.
name: Wool Shirt

description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two wooly lamb grazing and the letter "S".
  • After a Survivor interacts with a Dream Snare or Dream Pallet, The Survivor suffers from the Blindness status effect for 30 seconds.
name: Sheep Block

description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
  • Gain an extra 200 bonus Bloodpoints towards Deviousness when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.
  • Considerably decreases the Dream Snare speed penalty for survivors.
name: Kid's Drawing

description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
Replace Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • 7 Dream Tokens.
name: Garden Rake

description:
A homemade tool to facilitate bush trimming.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • 7 Dream Tokens.
  • survivors have their aura revealed to The Nightmare for 4 seconds when they interact with Dream Pallets.
name: Prototype Claws

description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
While survivors are in the Dream World:
  • The sounds of their generator repairs can be heard from 8 meters further away.
name: Outdoor Rope

description:
A crude and bold sketch made with fusain, signed Nancy H.
  • Slightly increases Dream Projection power recovery speed for each Survivor in the Dream World.
name: Nancy's Sketch

description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.
While survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Slightly increases healing and repair regression penalties.
  • A Survivor's aura will be revealed to The Nightmare for 3 seconds whenever they fail a healing or repair Skill Check.
name: Green Dress

description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping cat and the letter "C".
  • After a Survivor interacts with a Dream Snare or Dream Pallet, The Survivor suffers from the Hemorrhage status effect for 60 seconds.
name: Cat Block

description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing unicorn and the letter "U".
  • After a Survivor interacts with a Dream Snare or Dream Pallet, The Survivor suffers from the Blindness status effect for 60 seconds.
name: Unicorn Block

description:
Rusty but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
While survivors are in the Dream World:
  • The sounds of their footsteps are 50% louder.
name: Swing Chains

description:
A painting of a character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasured memory.
  • Moderately increases Dream Projection power recovery speed for each Survivor in the Dream World.
name: Nancy's Masterpiece

description:
A long double dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
While survivors are in the Dream World:
  • The sounds of their grunts of pain are 50% louder.
name: Jump Rope

description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which front is ruined by large cuts.
While survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Slightly increases healing and repair regression penalties.
  • A Survivor's aura will be revealed to The Nightmare for 4 seconds whenever they fail a healing or repair Skill Check.
name: Blue Dress

description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called Zoneral.
  • survivors will see The Nightmare intermittently at a reduced distance of 12 meters to 24 meters.
  • The Nightmare is invisible to survivors beyond 24 meters.
  • The Nightmare is invisible to awake survivors while carrying a Survivor.
name: Pill Bottle

description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • 7 Dream Tokens.
  • survivors have their aura revealed to The Nightmare for 6 seconds when they interact with Dream Pallets.
name: Paint Thinner

description:
A large photograph taken at Badham preschool showing the cheerful class of 94-95.
  • Channeling Dream Projection can no longer be cancelled.
  • All generators will spew blood while The Nightmare channels Dream Projection.
  • The Nightmare's projection will not appear when using Dream Projection.
name: Class Photo

description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which only recognizable feature is the letter "Z".
  • After a Survivor interacts with a Dream Snare or Dream Pallet, The Survivor suffers from the Hemorrhage status effect for 60 seconds.
  • If The Survivor is healthy, they will bleed for the duration of the Hemorrhage status effect.
name: "Z" Block

description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
  • All survivors start the trial in the Dream World.
  • Failed Skill Checks do not wake up survivors in the Dream World.
name: Red Paint Brush

description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.
While survivors are in the Dream World:
  • Recently-opened exit gates are blocked for 15 seconds.
name: Black Box

description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box: the lubricated parts make the search a more a delicate exercise.
  • Slightly increases Skill Checks trigger odds when interacting with a Jigsaw Box.
name: Workshop Grease

description:
Symbol of a broken way of life. Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • Slightly decreases the Ambush Attack miss cooldown.
name: Shattered Syringe

description:
The medical file of a cancerous man. Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.
  • Slightly decreases the Ambush Attack Charging Time.
name: John's Medical File

description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
  • Slightly decreases time it takes to Crouch.
name: Combat Straps

description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda. Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • Slightly decreases the Ambush attack charging time.
  • Slightly decreases the Ambush attack miss cooldown.
name: Video Tape

description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: Sharp blades attached to the trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
  • survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Hemorrhage status effect.
name: Utility Blades

description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box: The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search.
  • Moderately Increases Skill Check trigger odds when interacting with a Jigsaw Box.
name: Razor Wires

description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.
  • Increases available Reverse Bear Trap by 1.
name: Last Will

description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target making it hard to concentrate.
  • survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Blindness status effect.
  • Does not affect the Jigsaw Box highlight.
name: Face Mask

description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: A poison that is not fatal but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.
  • survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Exhausted status effect.
name: Slow-Release Toxin

description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Injured survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled status effect.
name: Rusty Attachments

description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in details on a sheet of paper.
  • Increases available Jigsaw Boxes by 1.
name: Jigsaw's Sketch

description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box: The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without slitting one's wrists.
  • Tremendously Increases the penalty of failed Skill Checks on Jigsaw Boxes.
name: Interlocking Razor

description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.
  • Slightly increases time it takes Survivor to Search a Jigsaw Box.
  • Slightly decreases time it takes to put the Reverse Bear Trap.
name: Bag of Gears

description:
A timer that has been fiddled with. A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
  • Moderately reduces the Reverse Bear Trap death timer.
name: Tampered Timer

description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design layed down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
  • Increases available Jigsaw Boxes by 1.
  • Moderately increases the Reverse Bear Trap death timer.
name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan

description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.
  • Considerably increases time it takes Survivor to Search a Jigsaw Box.
  • Moderately decrease time it takes to put the Reverse Bear Trap on a Survivor.
name: Crate of Gears

description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses. Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
  • Disables The Pig's ability to see Jigsaw Boxes' auras.
  • Gain a notification when a Survivor removes a Reverse Bear Trap.
  • Auras of survivors removing a Reverse Bear Trap are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
name: Amanda's Secret

description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
  • Disables the survivors' ability to see Jigsaw Boxes highlighted until their Trap is activated.
name: Rule Set No.2
flavor: "Listen, there are rules" -Jigsaw

description:
A blackmailing letter for the attention of Amanda. Fills the reader with rage and focus.
  • While Crouched, see outlines of survivors within a 12-meter range.
  • Reduces available Reverse Bear Traps by 3.
  • Reduces available Jigsaw Boxes by 2.
name: Amanda's Letter
flavor: "Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." -Amanda's Letter

description:
A moldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
  • Moderately increase movement speed while reloading bottles.
name: Smelly Inner Soles

description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
  • Slightly decreases cooldown time between bottle throws.
name: Robin Feather

description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel; the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
  • Changes thrown bottle arc.
name: Fingerless Parade Gloves

description:
Be the life of the party!

  • Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual gas effect.
  • Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts actions as usual, and awards 100 bloodpoints.
name: Party Bottle

description:
A sturdy cork, fitting The Afterpiece Tonic bottles perfectly.
  • Moderately decreases reload Time.
name: Thick Cork Stopper

description:
An empty bottle, sticky with dried sugar and blood.
  • Start with 1 extra bottle.
  • Increases maximum carried bottles amount by 1.
name: Sticky Soda Bottle

description:
A black feather with an emerald sheen, very soft to the touch.
  • Moderately decreases cooldown time between The bottle throws.
name: Starling Feather

description:
A volatile chemical compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of The Afterpiece Antidote.
  • Moderately increases the Invigorated effect duration.
name: Solvent Jug

description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
  • Intoxicated target suffers from the Blindness status effect for 30 seconds.
name: Kerosene Can

description:
An all time classic. You won't see things quite the same again.
  • Makes The Afterpiece Tonic clouds yellow.
  • Makes The Afterpiece Antidote clouds purple.
name: VHS Porn

description:
An odorless syrupy liquid which is highly corrosive.
  • Intoxicated target suffers from the Mangled status effect.
name: Sulfuric Acid Vial

description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burn and lungs damage.
  • Intoxicated target suffers Moderately from an extra Hindered Penalty.
name: Flask of Bleach

description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia. One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
  • Moderately expands The Afterpiece Antidote Gas area.
name: Spirit of Hartshorn

description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anesthetic capabilities.
  • Moderately expands The Afterpiece Tonic Gas area.
name: Bottle of Chloroform

description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote. The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effects.
  • Considerably increases Invigorated Effect duration.
name: Garish Makeup Kit

description:
Along with a hell of a headache, the only remnant of a good time, done cheap.
  • Start with 2 extra bottles.
  • Increases maximum carried bottles amount by 2.
name: Cheap Gin Bottle

description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
  • Considerably increases Intoxicated Effect duration.
name: Ether 15 vol%

description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers. Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
  • When a Survivor or Killer becomes Invigorated, they see all other Survivor and Killer auras within a 16m radius.
name: Cigar Box

description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man. Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
  • Auras of Intoxicated or Invigorated survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
name: Tattoo's Middle Finger

description:
The prized pinky of a redhead. Faintly fragrant. Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
  • survivors hit directly by a bottle of The Afterpiece Tonic suffer from the Exposed status effect for the duration of the intoxication.
name: Redhead's Pinky Finger

description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.
  • Slightly increases Yamaoka’s Haunting movement speed.
name: Zōri

description:
A talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.
  • Slightly increases Yamaoka’s Haunting duration.
name: Shiawase Amulet

description:
One of the one thousand orizuru for your wish to come true.
  • Slightly increases Yamaoka’s Haunting power recovery speed.
name: Origami Crane

description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle disheveled hair.
  • Slightly increases Yamaoka’s Haunting activation charge speed.
name: Gifted Bamboo Comb

description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.
  • Moderately increases Yamaoka’s Haunting activation charge speed.
name: White Hair Ribbon

description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass. The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.
  • Moderately Increases Yamaoka’s Haunting power recovery speed.
name: Rin's Broken Watch

description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".
  • Moderately increases Yamaoka’s Haunting movement speed.
name: Muddy Sports Day Cap

description:
A talisman to get luck on your side.
  • Moderately increases Yamaoka’s Haunting duration.
name: Kaiun Talisman

description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree. Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.
  • Slightly increases the frequency of passive phasing.
name: Juniper Bonsai

description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.
  • Considerably increases Yamaoka’s Haunting power recovery speed.
name: Rusty Flute

description: Katsumori Talisman
name: Katsumori Talisman

description:
The handguard of an ancestral blade. Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • Slightly increases Yamaoka’s Haunting reappearance duration.
  • Slightly increases Yamaoka’s Haunting reappearance speed.
name: Katana Tsuba

description:
A handy pair of indoor shoes.
  • Considerably increases Yamaoka’s Haunting movement speed.
name: Dirty Uwabaki

description:
A hair brooch crusted with dried blood.
  • Considerably increases Yamaoka’s Haunting activation charge speed.
name: Bloody Hair Brooch

description:
A powerful talisman to protect your endeavors from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
  • Tremendously increases Yamaoka’s Haunting duration.
  • Slightly decreases Yamaoka’s Haunting movement speed.
name: Yakuyoke Amulet

description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade. Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • Moderately increases Yamaoka’s Haunting reappearance duration.
  • Moderately increases Yamaoka’s Haunting reappearance speed.
name: Wakizashi Saya

description:
A powerful bracelet that reads a sacred mantra.
  • The phasing sound emission is heard by all survivors outside of the Terror Radius.
name: Prayer Beads Bracelet

description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower. Once the symbol of mortality.
  • Slightly increases passive phasing duration.
  • Slightly increases the frequency of passive phasing.
name: Dried Cherry Blossom

description:
A silver ring engraved with “for my precious daughter.”
  • Tremendously increases Yamaoka’s Haunting movement speed.
  • Scratch marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka’s Haunting.
name: Mother-Daughter Ring

description:
A pair of dad glasses that belonged to an overworked salaryman.
  • Survivor blood trails are visible while using Yamaoka’s Haunting.
name: Father's Glasses

description:
A friendly-looking bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy applies the Blindness status effect for 60 seconds.
name: Smiley Face Pin

description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
  • Slightly decreases the time required to refill the power gauge.
name: Scratched Ruler

description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish; memento of brighter days.
  • Slightly increases Feral Frenzy duration.
name: Mischief List

description:
A wide gray and red braided rope bracelet. The inscription "F J S J" can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
  • Slightly increases Killer Instinct's detection range.
name: Friendship Bracelet

description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or other draining activities.
  • Moderately increases Killer Instinct's detection range.
name: Never-Sleep Pills

description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
  • Moderately increases Feral Frenzy duration.
name: Mural Sketch

description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made mainly from power ballads with gloomy melodies.
  • Slightly decreases fatigue after Feral Frenzy ends.
name: Julie's Mix Tape

description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
  • Moderately decreases the time required to refill the power gauge.
name: Etched Ruler

description:
A once friendly-looking bright yellow button of a defaced smiley. A signature icon of The Legion.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy applies the Mangled status effect.
name: Defaced Smiley Pin

description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion. To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy applies the Broken status effect for 60 seconds.
name: The Legion Pin

description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape of energizing songs with break-neck beats.
  • Tremendously increases Killer Instinct's detection range.
name: Susie's Mix Tape

description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre, sketches.
  • Considerably increases Feral Frenzy duration.
name: Stolen Sketch Book

description:
This blade is stained with unsanitary spots of grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Slightly increases the amount of time required for survivors to complete the Mend action.
name: Nasty Blade

description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
  • Moderately decreases fatigue after Feral Frenzy ends.
name: Joey's Mix Tape

description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library vulgarizing a study on lesions and stab wounds.
  • Moderately decreases the Deep Wound timer of all survivors.
name: Stab Wounds Study

description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes. A track list of massive distortion and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
  • Allows Feral Frenzy attacks to considerably reduce a Survivor's Deep Wound timer.
name: Frank's Mix Tape

description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Moderately increases the amount of time required for survivors to complete the Mend action.
name: Filthy Blade

description:
A handful of dirt collected from the janitor's final resting place. It is unnaturally cold.
  • Considerably decreases fatigue after Feral Frenzy ends.
name: Cold Dirt

description:
A glass-like button molded from The Fog that captures The Legion’s likeness. The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.

During Feral Frenzy:
  • Your Terror Radius affects the entire map.
  • Any pallets you vault are immediately broken.

    • This effect lasts until the power gauge is depleted.
name: Iridescent Button
flavor: “The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity.”

description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable vocals from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
  • While using Feral Frenzy, the repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.
name: Fuming Mix Tape

description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
  • Slightly decreases Pool of Devotion activation time.
  • Slightly increases movement Speed while holding Corrupt Purge.
name: Prayer Tablet Fragment

description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
  • Slightly increases movement speed while charging Vile Purge.
name: Olibanum Incense

description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
  • Slightly increases infection time on objects.
name: Limestone Seal

description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two. Applied on skin rashes.
  • Slightly decreases Vile Purge cooldown.
name: Healing Salve

description:
A soapstone amulet crudely engraved with a winged deity that wards off sickness. Fills the wearer with devotion.
  • Slightly increases Duration of Corrupt Purge.
name: Prophylactic Amulet

description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol. Applied directly on blisters.
  • Moderately decreases Vile Purge cooldown.
name: Potent Tincture

description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hardstone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines. Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
  • Moderately increases infection time on objects.
name: Hematite Seal

description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed. Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Slightly increases Vile Purge effectiveness.
name: Emetic potion

description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony. Delicious.
  • Start trial with 1 additional corrupted Pool of Devotion.
name: Blessed Apple

description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality. Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
  • Moderately increases Vile Purge charge speed.
name: Rubbing Oil

description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin. The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting. Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Moderately increases Vile Purge effectiveness.
name: Infected Emetic

description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuse a sweet and earthy aroma. Applied directly on infected skin.
  • Slightly increases movement speed while charging Vile Purge.
  • Moderately decreases Vile Purge cooldown.
name: Incensed Ointment

description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the god of mayhem and pestilence. Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
  • Moderately increases the duration of Corrupt Purge.
name: Exorcism Amulet

description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes. Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
  • Start trial with 1 additional corrupted Pool of Devotion.
  • Slightly increases infection time on objects.
name: Ashen Apple

description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
  • Moderately decreases Pool of Devotion activation time.
  • Moderately increases movement Speed while holding Corrupt Purge.
name: Worship Tablet

description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients. Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting. Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Considerably increases Vile Purge effectiveness.
name: Vile Emetic

description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck. Radiates with vile power.
  • Considerably increases the rate survivors gain infection from interactions.
name: Severed Toe

description:
A bloodstone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian god of mayhem and pestilence. Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
  • Considerably increases duration of Corrupt Purge.
name: Devotee's Amulet

description:
A translucent cylindrical seal molded from The Fog Itself with the effigy of The Plague. Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
  • Moderately decrease movement Speed while holding Corrupt Purge.
  • Tremendously decreases the duration of Corrupt Purge.
  • Vile Purge becomes Corrupt Purge every time a generator is completed.
name: Iridescent Seal

description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings. The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
  • survivors' auras are revealed to you for 5 seconds when they vomit.
name: Black Incense

description:
Stolen camera from a victim of Olsen’s in Philadelphia, where he worked before. The film inside captured his last night in the city.
  • Slightly increases the rate at which a Survivor becomes Marked when not leaning from cover.
name: “Philly”
flavor: “Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I don’t wanna forget any of it.” –The Ghost Face

description:
A sheet of matches from Walleyes, a small bar in Northern Roseville. A victim’s phone number is scribbled in blue. One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
  • Slightly increases Night Shroud power recovery rate.
name: Walleyes Matchbook

description:
Cutouts of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania. While Ghost Face only authored some of the headlines, he committed all the murders.
Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
  • Slightly increases movement speed while Stalking.
name: Headlines Cutouts

description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol. Worn by Ghost Face to make his presence known. Reserved for impromptu visits.
  • Slightly increases the duration of a Survivor staying Marked.
name: Cheap Cologne

description:
Manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
  • Slightly increases the rate at which a Survivor becomes Marked when not leaning from cover.
  • Slightly increases the duration of a Survivor staying Marked.
name: Telephoto Lens

description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries. The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims. Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
  • Moderately increases movement speed while Stalking.
name: Olsen’s Journal

description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing. All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
  • Moderately Increases Night Shroud power recovery rate.
name: Olsen's Address Book

description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida. Each X represents a victim of The Ghost Face. Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
  • Slightly increases the duration that Killer Instinct is visible when The Killer is revealed.
name: Marked Map

description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
  • Slightly increases movement speed while Crouched.
name: Cinch Straps

description:
Olsen’s wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen’s first Roseville victim. Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
  • Considerably increases movement speed while Stalking.
name: Olsen’s Wallet

description:
Quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade. Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
  • Moderately increases movement speed while Crouched.
name: Leather Knife Sheath

description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by Ghost Face to announce his presence. Reserved for victims he planned to write about.
  • Moderately increases the duration of a Survivor staying Marked.
name: Lasting Perfume

description:
Perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly. No one knows what you’re planning to do tonight.
  • Moderately increases the rate at which a Survivor becomes Marked when not leaning from cover.
name: Knife Belt Clip

description:
Blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny’s DNA. Incriminating evidence that was never found.
  • Considerably increases Night Shroud power recovery rate.
name: Chewed Pen

description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen’s first victim in Roseville. Compiling your victim’s habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
  • Moderately increases the duration that Killer Instinct is visible when The Killer is revealed.
  • Moderately decreases the detection range to reveal The Killer while Night Shroud is active.

    • “I’ve been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people don’t forget.” -The Ghost Face
name: Victim’s Detailed Routine

description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness. Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
  • Considerably increases the rate at which a Survivor becomes Marked when not leaning from cover.
name: Night Vision Monocular

description:
Sheath allowing a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely. Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
  • Considerably increases movement speed while Crouched.
    • “Gotta get ready like a scout– without the stupid patches. What I get is much better.” -The Ghost Face
name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath

description:
A driver’s license revealing Olsen’s true identity: Danny Johnson.
  • Considerably decreases the detection range to reveal The Killer while Night Shroud is active.
name: Driver's License
flavor: "They all want to know who The Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is, who’s next." -The Ghost Face

description:
Tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorized Roseville.
  • Tremendously increases the rate at which a Survivor becomes Marked when leaning from cover.
  • Considerably decreases the rate at which a Survivor becomes Marked when not leaning from cover.
name: “Ghost Face Caught on Tape”
flavor: “In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida. The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area. Lock your doors: a killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a Ghost in the night.” –The Roseville Gazette

description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville. The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of Ghost Face without providing any real clues to the police.
  • The auras of all survivors outside of your Terror Radius are revealed for 4 seconds when a Marked Survivor is put into the dying state.
name: Outdoor Security Camera
flavor: "An image is worth a thousand words.” –The Ghost Face

description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
